Bellevue.University Village, Seattle: University Village (colloquially known as U-Village or U-Vill) is a shopping mall in Seattle, Washington, built at the south corner of Ravenna neighborhood. Located north of Downtown Seattle, University Village is an open-air lifestyle shopping center which offers restaurants, locally owned boutiques, and signature national retailers. U-Village is a regional destination for home furnishings, popular fashions and unique gift items with a distinct collection of restaurants and eateries.
